products.title: Aguas Linen Splash Blue Roman Blind
products.description: With a pattern resembling a watercolour landscape rendered in dark and blue hues, this beautiful roman blind is thoroughly modern-looking and artistic. The presence of darker tones masks the blue enough that the effect is neutral and easy to match, but strong and bold enough with a pattern resembling a watercolour landscape rendered in dark and blue hues, this beautiful roman blind is thoroughly modern-looking and artistic.

products.title: Splash Tropez - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash tropez light filtering blind is an elegant grey/ brown colour, it will work well in most spaces due to it's rich earthy tones. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Oyster - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash oyster light filtering skylight blind is a very light, natural cream colour perfect for a skylight window. This neutral tone will work well in most spaces. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Beige - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash beige light filtering skylight blind is a light, natural looking colour for your skylight window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Rock - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash rock light filtering skylight blind is a stunning mid grey hue. It's a modern, on trend colour choice & will be a perfect finishing touch for your window. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Snow - Light Filtering Velux Keylite Fakro Dakstra
products.description: The splash snow light filtering skylight blind, is an attractive pure white colour which is the perfect blind to help transform a space. The blind comes with sleek, modern aluminium framework which is also available in a white colour. Their skylight blinds also have the option to include a control rod for those more difficult to reach windows. As with all their made to measure products this blind will come with a 5 year guarantee for extra peace of mind.

products.title: Splash Vine Green Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash vine green a bright and lush green perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous green blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
